abstracts.cdata!:
This report is an environmental
            assessment of the Port Access and Management Project.  It
            first addresses the general situation of the transport
            system in Poland as well as the need for modernization.  It
            then reviews the environmental background of the
            project's area.  Next, the report discusses some
            alternative technological solutions for the project.  The
            environmental effects of the project are then addressed,
            such as the effects on the local flora and fauna.  Finally,
            the report recommends some methods to minimize these
            negative impacts.
